title: Not able to login
body: Any one else unable to logon to league? Been trying to log on for a while but it just says "did not receive a response from the server. retrying. attempt 1, 2, 3"

replies.body: I THINK RITO REALLY WANTS US TO WATCH THE SKT VS FLASH WOLVES GROUP STAGE GAME, BUT RIOT IM ON CAPPED NET AND WATCHING VIDEOS CHEWS TOO MUCH DATA COMPARED TO PLAYING

Rito pls, the one day where i get to relax from exams i cant even play... Wasn't able to join a queue and logged out in an attempt to fix it; can't even login.

Edit: Was able to Log in! Queue seems dead lol
I've been trying to login since 8:30pm and its now 9:29pm and I still cant login, so unfair as my partner has been able to play all night perfectly fine. Thought my account was hacked or something.
Riot should compensate for those players who are influenced by this issue.
same problem here. same error message. !!!
Yeah I can't log in, thought my account got hacked or something :")
yeah im getting the same thing {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
YES THANK GOD IM NOT THE ONLY ONE
God damn Rito, first i can't connect to chat or join ranked games now i can't even login. Fix yo shit.
Same, none of my friends can either, cant even login to the support to tell them....
